scripts.e2e:prepare: npm run -s e2e:db:wait && DATABASE_URL=$(bash scripts/e2e-db-url.sh) npm run -s db:migrate
scripts.test:e2e: npm run -s e2e:db:up && npm run -s e2e:prepare && DATABASE_URL=$(bash scripts/e2e-db-url.sh) AUTH_SECRET=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(require('crypto').randomBytes(32).toString('hex'))") NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3000 APP_CRED_ENC_KEY=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(require('crypto').randomBytes(32).toString('base64'))") GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=dummy GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=dummy E2E_TEST_MODE=1 npx playwright test && npm run -s e2e:db:down
